amendment.description: An amendment numbered 62 printed in Part A of House Report 118-147 to strike authorization for the Essential Air Service.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to strike the authorization for the Essential Air Service.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McClintock amendment (A017) Failed by recorded vote: 49 - 386 (Roll no. 351).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A017) offered by Mr. McClintock.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the McClintock amendment (A017) Failed by recorded vote: 49 - 386 (Roll no. 351).
